meanings.definition: Not consisting of or resembling wood.
meanings.sent1: The paper was nonwoody and felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The plastic toy was nonwoody and lightweight.
meanings.sent3: The nonwoody chair looked like it was made of clouds!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as nonwoody as a feather floating in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The nonwoody fabric was so soft, it felt like a gentle breeze against my skin.

meanings.definition: Not having the characteristics of wood.
meanings.sent1: The metal table was nonwoody but sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The rubber ball was nonwoody and bounced easily.
meanings.sent3: His nonwoody shoes made him feel like he was walking on air!
meanings.sent4: The nonwoody taste of the fruit was surprisingly refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The nonwoody texture of the sponge made it perfect for cleaning delicate surfaces.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to plants that do not have a woody stem.
meanings.sent1: The nonwoody plant had flexible stems that swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The nonwoody flowers bloomed brightly in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The nonwoody tree looked like a giant bouquet of leaves!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as nonwoody as a field of wildflowers.
meanings.sent5: The nonwoody vines twisted and climbed, creating a beautiful natural canopy.
